about_the_game:
In Sorcero, your goal is to command thousands of units into epic battles while supporting them with powerful spells cast from your mage tower. The game features both a campaign mode and a skirmish mode. In the campaign, players will face a series of challenging skirmishes, upgrading and choosing their spells and units between battles to prepare for the next encounter.

Key Features:


  • Variety of Spells: Utilize a vast array of spells, from pure damage spells like fireballs and lightning bolts to terrain-altering spells such as flame zones, ice fields, and healing areas. Defensive spells include shields and walls, while utility spells offer buffs, decoys, and more.
  • Strategic Unit Management: Deploy a diverse range of units, each with unique abilities and strengths. Adapt your strategy to counter enemy forces effectively.
  • Skill Tree: Progress through a detailed skill tree with multiple branches, focusing on either magic or units. Each branch offers further specialization, allowing players to tailor their strategy to their playstyle.
  • Campaign Mode: Engage in a series of skirmishes with strategic decisions to be made between battles. Upgrade your spells and units to gain the upper hand in increasingly difficult encounters.
  • Skirmish Mode: Jump into standalone battles to test your strategies and skills without the overarching campaign structure.
  • Customization and Specialization: Upgrade your units and spells, specializing in certain domains to enhance your combat effectiveness.
  • Stunning Visuals: Experience a low-poly fantasy world with high-quality VFX and lighting composition, bringing the magical battlefield to life.

With hours of gameplay, Sorcero challenges you to manage your economy, adapt to ever-changing enemy tactics, and strategically choose upgrades and spells to dominate the battlefield.

Are you ready to become the ultimate sorcerer and conquer your enemies?

content_descriptors.notes: Sorcero contains representations of fantasy violence as it depicts a war between two large armies. Players will encounter scenes of intense battles, including spells that cause explosions and significant destruction. There are no depictions of sexual content, sexual assault, non-consensual relationships, substance abuse, or self-harm in the game. The focus is solely on strategic combat and magical warfare. Please be aware that the game’s battle scenes may be intense for some players due to the nature of large-scale conflicts and magical explosions.

  • OS: windows 10 or newer

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070

short_description: In Sorcero, send waves of units into battle while casting powerful spells from your mage tower to destroy the enemy's tower. Manage your economy, adapt to enemy forces, and choose upgrades and spells wisely to dominate the battlefield and claim victory.
